title: Hiltl Sihlstrasse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European
description: Haus Hiltl is the first and oldest vegetarian restaurant in Europe, operating since 1898. Its large facility has modern decor and is 5 minute walk south of the main train station. Offers many choices and gets busy at mealtime. There's buffet, self-service and takeaway, a la carte menu, a bar-lounge, a cooking studio, and a shop. English spoken.
